name: Mohit Bhandari
title: Professor, Surgery
overview: Dr. Bhandari is a designated Distinguished University Professor- an honor held by less than 2% of McMaster Faculty.He serves as Chair of Surgery and he holds Senior Tier Canada Research Chair in Surgery   Dr. Bhandari is a recipient of the Order of Ontario, and more recently inducted into the Order of Canada. He has received the Distinguished Alumni Award from McMaster University.
